data.system_settings: Android Marshmallow 6.0.1 BLU Life One X2
data.actual_result: You get an error from Clyde sometimes but the user can still see your DM that you sent.
data.expected_result: You get an error from Clyde or the box is grayed out.
data.short_description: You can DM people you blocked on mobile and they will receive a notification for it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Block someone - DM them a few messages
